--- In E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "Tim" <tjwoolwo@.. .> wrote:
>
> 
> Annie / Jay,
>=
 
> I am sorry to hear that you have to go through this. 
> 
> How long aft=
er you moved into this place did the events in question begin occurring? Di=
d they begin after a traumatic event? Or after a previously used object was=
 brought in to the house? Have you dabbled with opening portals via ritual =
or device recently? Have you asked anything to manifest itself to you?
> 
>=
 What it sounds like you have is an intelligent entity that is responding t=
o you. The more sound it makes, the more you notice it. Someone is trying t=
o get your attention, and it does not appear to be negative by the way you =
describe it (no one is getting hurt, things are not breaking).
> 
> So ther=
efore, the question is why are they trying to get your attention? My first =
guess is that because you have intimated that you ad your partners are sens=
itives; this may be why this being is drawn to you. It may feel that you ca=
n understand it better than most and therefore help it.
> 
> You have menti=
oned that you have done rituals. I am assuming that one of those rituals is=
 a cleansing. A cleansing typically works with an intelligent entity if it =
is done properly. In cases like this, the most important thing to know is t=
hat you can never tell an entity to leave. If it is intelligent, it will le=
ave on its own accord. 
> 
> In my experience, I have found that most of th=
e time, the entity is "stuck" here. They passed on, but missed the light. F=
rom EVP's and Box sessions, I have found that most of these entities stuck =
are afraid of eternal judgement so they avoided the light. This creates a w=
orld for them which grows more and more hopeless as time passes on, a sort =
of "limbo" if you will. The more hopeless they get, the more angrier they b=
ecome.
> 
> If you do a cleansing properly, the entity should be able to le=
ave:
> 
> 1). Open all your windows and doors.
> 2). Use only a fresh sage =
smudge stick (pick it yourself or buy them from a farmer on eBay). When bur=
ning sage, carry a metal bowl around to catch the ash and a grill lighter (=
fresh sage wants to go out a lot at first, try to keep it lit before it bur=
ns out). If you set the sage on glass, it will break from the heat and plas=
tic will melt.
> 3). Buy a blessed salt mixture from your local esoteric sh=
op. If you don't have one nearby, send me an email and I'll ship you a bag.=

> 4). Protect yourself and focus in on the energy of the house. If you are=
 sensitive you should be able to tell if it is male or female and that is a=
 great start. 
> 5). Begin in the basement of the house and proceed through=
 every
> room of the house while leaving the most active room of the house =
for last. Before you leave each room, sprinkle the salt at the opening of a=
ny window or door to bind it.
> 6). Most importantly, take your house back =
but be nice. Address the entity directly compassionately and begin a one si=
ded conversation with it. Tell him or her that it needs to cross over, that=
 there is nothing but peace on the other side, that friends and loved ones =
are waiting, and that there is nothing to fear and to not be afraid. It is =
a place of no judgement but of pure understanding and love, and that it is =
the natural progression of life and there physical time on earth is done fo=
r now. Let it know that the house is no longer there's and that you do not =
desire it's presence in you life any longer. This is very important: invite=
 it to let your spirit guides show it the way to the light. Let it know tha=
t once it crosses over, it can come back to check on loved ones, but it nee=
ds to cross over first to learn the way. Keep saying these things politely =
and confidently.
> 7). Chances are when you reach the last room, your entit=
y will have holed itself in there and this is where you need to be at your =
strongest and most confident. If you feel it in there with you, have a hear=
t to heart with it and say these things. Tell it how it is disrupting your =
family and all the things about crossing over. Also be clear about whether =
or not you will allow it to come back and visit you after it has crossed; i=
f you feel good about the process I would invite it back if it will be peac=
eful (this makes you seem less forceful).
> 
> You should feel an energy li=
ft if it happens. Let your house air out and then say a binding prayer befo=
re closing each window and door. do not snuff out the sage, bring it outsid=
e and let it burn its way out. Some people recommend binding the perimeter =
of the house with salt but this should not be necessary.
> 
> I have done t=
his many times and it works most of the time. 
> 
> Good luck, 
> TJ
> 
>
